description.en:
1-2) Candy Boy: Hyogo Sakura, the high school feather-weight champion in boxing, moved away from Yokohama, but now he's come back and is reunited with his childhood friend Tetsushi Kujuu, who does karate. And seeing Tetsushi again just spurns Sakura on...

3) Innocent Boy: Hamuro Yuuki's family is financial trouble and he has agreed to sell his body in order to get money. But Yuuki wants his first to be someone he knows before he has to sleep with other men.

4) The Scarlet Cresent Moon / The Crimson Cresent Moon: Fujifusa, the manager of the Sakura Inn's branch has a customer, Takamiya Seiji, who want's Fujifusa for more than just as a drinking company.

5) Candy Boy Afterwards: The boys from Candy Boy, Tetsushi and Sakura have exams coming up and Sakura makes plans to celebrate the end of the semester.
